text:
RT @RobGMacfarlane: A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.
Bankside trees grubbed out & burnt.
Riverbed scraped out.
M‚Ä¶

Counting #salmon redds in Swindale Beck today with @EnvAgencyNW. Really decent numbers, with at least 43 redds seen in the 1km stretch at the bottom of the valley, and plenty further up too. Saw loads of big fish, dead & alive. #rivers https://t.co/CJviM1ZN7n

@RobGMacfarlane @StuartMaconie @EnvAgency At this time of year, when salmon and trout are spawning, and heavier rainfall will just wash all that soil into the river,  it's just despicable, made worse by the fact we cannot rely on the EA to respond adequately.
